Mindful Video Watcher for Kids
This Chrome extension helps kids watch videos with focus and mindfulness. Watch a video until the end, and once it finishes, the extension automatically opens our website where children can chat with our friendly AI assistant. It's a fun way to engage with content thoughtfully, while also encouraging curiosity and learning. Perfect for a balanced screen time experience!
